Subject: Delivery, Assembly + Setup - Furniture - From DIP to IPC Villa
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hrishikesh,

Need your support to arrange cover for the below shipments for the following:


*	
	Land transit from Chalhoub DIP warehouse to IPC Villa
*	
	Unpacking, installation and setup


Summary file for the invoices is provided for easy reference. Also, all items picked up from DIP have been received in good order. Shipments received with box damages are already inspected and found to be in good condition.

Delivery One: Cassina + El Furniture
 
Wednesday 18th June - Pick Up / Delivery
Thursday 19th June – Unpacking
Friday 20th June – Positioning (if access permits)
Saturday 21st June - Positioning
 
Delivery Two: Nemo Group
 
Thursday 26th June - Pick Up / Delivery
Friday 27th June – Unpacking / Positioning
Saturday 28th July – Final Positioning
 
Delivery Three: Living Divani
Dates TBC (once basement Entertainment room is ready)
 
Delivery : Lux Lounger
Dates TBC (as outdoor furniture)

Appreciate your kind support on the matter.
